coreComponents: EnterpriseSecuritySystem (core security system with DOD/Fortune 500 compliance)
SecureChatProcessor (secure chat processing with full security controls)
EnterpriseSecurityCLI (command line interface for security management)

Built-in compliance with regulations and standards
